```{r unionx, error=TRUE}
library('dplyr')
packageVersion('dplyr')
my_db <- dplyr::src_sqlite("replyr_sqliteEx.sqlite3", create = TRUE)
dr <- dplyr::copy_to(my_db,
                     data.frame(x=c(1,2),y=c('a','b'),stringsAsFactors = FALSE),'dr',
                     overwrite=TRUE)
dr <- head(dr,1)
# dr <- compute(dr)
print(dr)
print(dplyr::union_all(dr,dr))
```
